div.p: FoodType : This value set represents SNOMED CT codes for types of foods. This value set includes all the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID 255620007 Foods (substance) and is provided as a suggestive example.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 255620007

description.value: FoodType : This value set represents SNOMED CT codes for types of foods. This value set includes all the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID 255620007 Foods (substance) and is provided as a suggestive example.
